description: Number of arithmetic progressions of 3 or more positive integers, strictly increasing with sum n.
prog: (PARI) a(n)= t=0; st=0; forstep(s=(n-3)\3,1,-1, st++; for(c=1,st, m=3; w=m*(s+c); while(w<n, w=w+s+m*c; m++); if(w==n, t++))); t - _Rick L. Shepherd_, Aug 30 2006
author: _Clark Kimberling_
